name: ACT Fee Waivers
description: Receive two free ACT tests (including optional science/writing); free access to official ACT Self-Paced Course (Kaplan); send scores to up to 20 colleges; can request college application fee waivers
fullDescription: The ACT offers fee waivers for students from low-income families, removing financial barriers to college entrance testing.
whatTheyOffer:
- Two free ACT tests (with or without writing)
- Free access to official ACT Self-Paced Course (Kaplan prep)
- Send scores to up to 20 colleges for free
- Ability to request college application fee waivers
- Waived fees for late registration, standby testing, and test date changes
howToGetIt:
1. Must be in 11th or 12th grade
2. Must meet income eligibility guidelines
3. Talk to your high school counselor about eligibility
4. Counselor will provide fee waiver form
5. Use fee waiver code when registering for ACT
6. Present fee waiver at test center
